document.discussion_title: Business Halliburton says it cut 6,000 jobs in first quarter, delays earnings call
document.topic_text: Business: Halliburton says it cut 6,000 jobs in first quarter, delays earnings call Source: Reuters April 25, 2016 at 9:31 AM Halliburton Co said it cut more than 6,000 jobs in the first quarter, during which revenue slumped 40.4 percent and it took a $2.1 billion restructuring charge mainly for severance costs and asset write-offs amid the prolonged slump in oil prices. Continue reading You May Have Missed...
